items.text: stays back against the short ball and taps it to the right of square leg. Good placement
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, 2 runs

items.text: the bottom hand comes off the bat as he drives on the up, but it doesn't matter. He pierces the gap between backward and cover point and celebrates a boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, FOUR runs

items.text: nudges it off middle stump to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: tucks the shortish delivery on leg stump square of midwicket
items.postText: Pranav Kumar: "@Soham.. I think it is important to reach the final for that.. And 50/3 with a not so sure middle order, isn't the best way to do so. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: full and outside off, he drives to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: looks for a single with flick to square leg, but he's hit the ball too well and the fielder is alert
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: no turn this time as Rohit goes back to work the ball from off stump down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: flatter delivery - and that change in trajectory tempts Dhawan to go back when the length is pretty full. The left-hander then has to hurry into a flick to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: backs away and dabs to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: full and outside off, he drives all along the ground to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: just short?. The umpires get together for a conference. Dhawan stayed on the backfoot and whipped this length ball to short midwicket who dived forward. Fails to keep it down. Actually, it's dropped short. Mehidy has his palms pointing towards the ground as opposed to how you usually cup it for a catch with the palm facing upwards. The ball bounces into the ground as he closes his hands around it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, no run

items.text: back of a length, whipped to short fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, no run

items.text: goes too hard on a pull and gets a bottom edge to short fine
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, no run

items.text: better. Stands tall on the backfoot and punches down to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: short, backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, waits on the backfoot and punches to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, no run

items.preText: Dilip: "Mehidy gets a very nice drift on the ball which makes it very difficult for the batsman to use steps against him,a gud prospect for bangladesh for future."
items.text: length, spins in, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: slides it into the pads, Dhawan tries to flick and wears it on the pad. Sliding down leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: full, blocked off the front foot into the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: gets forward and defends towards point off the outside of the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: some turn there, covers it and pushes into the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: waits on the backfoot and punches to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: pitched up on off, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, clipped to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: shortish, stays back and tries to whip, dragged down to long-on off the toe-end
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sharma, 1 run
